description_multi.name: Neck
description_multi.description: Measure the circumference of pet's neck, you can reserve 2-3cm.

description_multi.name: Chest
description_multi.description: Measure the biggest circle around the chest, you can reserve 2-3cm. ( Chest is the most important data. )

description_multi.name: Back Length
description_multi.description: Measure the length of the pet's neck to the base of the tail.

description_multi.name: Length
description_multi.description: This measurement is associated with the full length of a leash, end to end.
